content:
# How to run a Cardano Wallet on Windows

![](https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/AOh14Gj4sqgAG-DE_L1vCzJpGgndya4HTQL-oSh7A6BXUg=s96-c)

A quick guide on how to install and run a Cardano Wallet / Web API on Windows server. Cardano Wallet requires a running node. Refer to my other video on how to run a Cardano Node here: <https://www.essentialcardano.io/video/how-to-run-cardano-node-on-windows>

## 1 contributors

![](https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/AOh14Gj4sqgAG-DE_L1vCzJpGgndya4HTQL-oSh7A6BXUg=s96-c)
